description:
Harima has a few hoops to jump through for his editor before his comic is complete. When Yakumo can’t help him out, she sends a very special assistant in her place!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s So Romantic, Harima! / Get Published in Zinegama, Harima! / Come On, Harima!
Romantic Da ne, Harima-kun! / Jingama ni Notta, Harima-kun! / Come on, Harima-kun!
ロマンチックだね, 播磨くん! / ジンガマに載った, 播磨くん! / キャモ~ン♡, 播磨くん!
